pkgmetadata.longdescription: A max-margin supervised Sparse Topical Coding Model // This is a C++ implementation of Sparse Topical Coding (STC), a model of discrete data which is fully described in Zhu et al. (2011) (http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~junzhu/stc/stc.pdf). It can be used for multi-class classification and describing documents with underlying sparse topics.
